snippet: Ray Lucas, a former quarterback for Rutgers and the Jets, discussed his addiction to painkillers with the hope that he can help others.
abstract: Ray Lucas, a former quarterback for Rutgers and the Jets, discussed his addiction to painkillers with the hope that he can help others.

headline.main: Q. and A. With Ray Lucas
headline.print_headline: 30 Seconds With Ray Lucas: ‘I Thought It Was All Over. I Was Done.’
